name: Hanes womens Comfort, Period. Underwear, Bikini Period Underwear, Super Leaks Period Underwear, 3-pack
product_description: GO ANYWHERE, DO ANYTHING PROTECTION With Hanes Comfort, Period.™ protection, you can go anywhere and do anything without worrying about leaks, odor, or bulk. The absorptive stain block liner in these bikini period panties helps reduce staining, while the streamlined design reduces bulk under your clothes. The super leaks protection offered in this period underwear is designed to provide peace of mind for periods, postpartum bleeding, unexpected leakage during exercise, or overnight accidents. Well-suited for extended wear, the moisture-wicking technology keeps you cooler and more comfortable while the odor guard helps to neutralize unwanted odors. A modern silhouette provides less coverage than traditional bikinis. Know what’s even better? This women's underwear is washable and reusable so it’s easier on your wallet.

name: LEAKPROOF2.0 Seamless Bikini Period Underwear for Women | Period Panties Holds 6 Tampons | Mild Incontinence Leak Proof Underwear (L/XL, Black)
short_description: 【HYPER LEAKPROOF AND X-DRY】: Our super leak proof fabric with surround barrier design provides 4-sides leakproof protection, ensuring you stay confident and worry-free. With a capacity to hold up to 6 tampons (40ml), Strawberry Weeks leak proof panties offers reliable protection and keeps you dry all day.

【SEAMLESS COMFORT ALL DAY】: Strawberry Weeks menstrual underwear is made with CLOUDFEEL-TECH fabric, ensuring a seamless, lightweight design. It's exceptionally soft and incredibly breathable, providing you with a smooth, irritation-free fit without any visible seams. Whether you're at the gym or doing your favorite workout routine, you can move freely and confidently, enjoying a hassle-free and comfortable wearing experience all day long.

【VERSATILE PROTECTION】: Designed to replace disposable menstrual products, Strawberry Weeks absorbent underwear provides reliable protection for light menstrual days, light bladder control, and backup needs. Whether worn alone or in combination with tampons or menstrual cups, our panties offer versatile and eco-friendly alternatives for different flow levels.

【PRECISE FIT FOR ALL SIZE】: Our high-tech fabric features double-sized stretch and high recovery, solving sizing issues, including plus size, and ensuring a snug fit around the waists and legs without being too loose or tight, preventing any rolling or discomfort.
【ALL-DAY FRESH】: Stay fresh and confident with Strawberry Weeks period panties. Our SILVADURTM Odor Control technology ensures long-lasting freshness.
